{{ if (strings.HasPrefix .Destination "mailto") -}} {{ with .Text -}} {{ partial "main/email" (dict "emailAddress" $.Destination "emailTitle" .) }} {{ else -}} {{ partial "main/email" (dict "emailAddress" $.Destination) }} {{ end -}} {{ else -}} {{ $link := .Destination | relURL }} {{ if not (strings.HasPrefix $link "/docs/staticsite") -}} {{ $link = printf "/docs/%s" $link }} {{ end -}} {{ .Text | safeHTML }} {{- end -}}
